document.full_text: this year's re-scheduled bahrain formula one grand prix cannot go ahead because of the situation in the country and opposition from teams, commercial supremo bernie ecclestone said wednesday.
document.title: bahrain f1 grand prix is "not on", says ecclestone
lines_and_colors: this year's re-scheduled bahrain formula one grand prix cannot go ahead because of the situation in the country and opposition from teams, commercial supremo bernie ecclestone said wednesday.
